extension.description: CloudSync delivers instant synchronization of watched status, resume points, and favorites across multiple Kodi devices using lightweight MQTT messaging. Features real-time updates, HiveMQ Cloud integration, and zero-conflict architecture without databases or file management.
extension.news: v2.0.2 - Fixed addon ID references and repository structure v2.0.1 - Repository automation update v2.0.0 - Initial release with MQTT-first architecture - Real-time watched status sync - Resume points synchronization - Favorites sync via Kodi API - HiveMQ Cloud support - No databases, pure event messaging
